alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS AND NORTH CENTRAL WASHBURN COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gordon, or 22 miles northwest of Hayward, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wascott, Minong, Gordon, Minong Flowage, and Saint Croix Flowage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
